en.title: Web Development Bootcamp â€” Learn & Build in 5 Days!
en.subtitle: Designed for Algerian learners who want real skills, fast.
en.description: Want to kickstart your tech career and build your first website from scratch? This hands-on training is made for Algerian students and beginners eager to master modern web development in just one week!

features.title: 100% Practical Learning
features.description: From day one, youâ€™ll code, build, and deploy your own real project.

features.title: Clear, Step-by-Step Teaching
features.description: We explain everything simply, with local examples and real-world practice.

features.title: Your Own Portfolio Website
features.description: By the last day, youâ€™ll publish your personal website live on GitHub!

sessions.content: Introduction to Web + Git & GitHub (How the internet works, HTTP, browsers, and version control basics).
HTML Hands-on: Build pages, forms, and semantic layouts.
CSS Fundamentals: colors, typography, spacing, and layouts.
Responsive layouts using Flexbox and Grid (mobile-friendly design).
JavaScript Basics: variables, functions, conditionals, and loops.
DOM Manipulation & Interactivity: handling events, forms, and animations.
Build a real responsive website and deploy it online using GitHub Pages.
Finalizing projects & exploring useful dev tools (VS Code, design platforms, etc.).
Career talk: How to grow as a web developer in Algeria and beyond.

benefits.title: What Youâ€™ll Gain
items: Use Git & GitHub like a professional
Gain the foundation to continue in internships or freelance projects

footer.title: Your Tech Journey Starts Here ğŸ’¡
footer.description: Register today for just 28,000 DA and start building your career in web development.
